messages.title: Standing up against 'Punch and Judy' politics
messages.content: "I have always sought common cause rather than conflict; consensus rather than division; and to achieve through persuasion rather than attack." Andrew led successful campaigns to remove tax discounts for second homes; to save the rail sleeper service; and to protect small farmers from the bully-boy buying practices of big supermarkets.

messages.title: Standing up for local people
messages.content: "A good MP should seek out the silent voices; stand up for the weak against the overly mighty; and challenge vested interests." Andrew has fought to strengthen the law to protect women from violence; has withstood intimidation from Councils and the press; and stood up for the poorest in our society and the developing world.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Led successful campaigns to remove tax discounts for second homes.
Led campaigns to save the rail sleeper service.
Protected small farmers from bully-boy buying practices of big supermarkets.
Fought to strengthen the law to protect women from violence.
Stood up for the poorest in our society and the developing world.

mentions.tacticalSituation: IT’S A STRAIGHT FIGHT BETWEEN ANDREW GEORGE AND THE CONSERVATIVES No other party can win here

housing.content: Led successful campaigns to remove tax discounts for second homes.
